ethera gos kilinochchiye hirawi sitina pa්rabhakarange duka sapa durakathanayen wimasana bawada wartha weyi.okthobar 20 weni dina sita ranilge narakama eerashtakaya aarambha weyi.ranilta saha mangalata yana ena man nathi bawa jyeshta chyothishawediyek manikyata kiweya. 20da eerashtakayen ranilta godaeema dushkara bawa ohu kiyanne ranilge kendraya balalaya.eksath jathika pakshaye manthi්range handahanda ema chyothishawediya bala thibe.owunge kendrawala hatiyata suba lakunu thibunath nayakayage muspenthukama owunta da balapana bawayi.ranilge hithawath aya ohuta pa්rawesam wana lesata awawada kara atha.
